Consumption Schedule.name: Consumption Schedule
Consumption Schedule.description: A consumption schedule organizes a set of consumption rates by which usage-based products are quoted and billed.

BillingTerm.description: The number used with the billing term unit to determine billing frequency.

BillingTermUnit.description: The unit used with the billing term to determine billing frequency

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this record is active (true) or not (false). Label is Active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MatchingAttribute.description: Salesforce Billing matches usage with a consumption schedule if the records share Matching Attribute value.

Name.description: Required. Default name of this record. Label is Product Name.

NumberOfRates.description: The number of consumption rates in this consumption schedule.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns a consumption schedule record.

RatingMethod.description: A specific use case to rate usage against the schedule. This field is the controlling picklist for the Type field.

SBQQ__Category__c.description: This field is available only with Salesforce CPQ.

Type.description: Defines how rate tiers are calculated.

UnitOfMeasure.description: A unit of measure defines how you quantify instances of usage for your usage products. For example, if your usage product is a cloud storage subscription, you could provide a value of GB for your unit of measure.

blng__BillingRule__c.description: This field is available only with Salesforce Billing.

blng__RevenueRecognitionRule__c.description: This field is available only with Salesforce Billing.

blng__TaxRule__c.description: This field is available only with Salesforce Billing.
